title: Mathieu van der Poel and His Tour de France-Olympic Mountain Bike Dilemma
content:
Dutch ace concedes it's either Tour de France or Olympic MTB in 2024, vows not to leave Tour early in pursuit of cross country gold.

Read the full article at Mathieu van der Poel and His Tour de France-Olympic Mountain Bike Dilemma on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
